name: North of England Zoological Society
legal: UK Registered Charity,number 306077 / company registered by guarantee, number 287902
goal: As more species decline towards extinction due to human activities, NEZS is tackling the threats head on by leading best practice in science, education and husbandry to create a sustainable future for wildlife. It does this by managing animal and plant populations, safeguarding habitats and empowering people to value nature and build conservation into their daily lives.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture
euInitiatives: Welfare of animals during transport order (2006), European Zoos Directive, Species protection
